#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
int t,n,a,b,c,i,j,temp,x;
long long sum;
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--)
{
sum=0;
scanf("%d%d%d%d",&n,&a,&b,&c);
if(n>=a+b+c)
printf("%d\n",(a+1)*(b+1)*(c+1));
else
{
if(a>b)
{
temp=a;
a=b;
b=temp;
}
if(b>c)
{
temp=b;
b=c;
c=temp;
}
for(i=0;i<=a;i++)
{
for(j=0;j<=b;j++)
{
x=i+j;
if(x>n)
{
continue;
}
else
{
if(c<n-(x))
sum+=c+1;
else
sum+=n-(x)+1;
}
 
}
 
}
printf("%lld\n",sum);
}
}
return 0;
}
